name: Apodaca 1890 (Amado Mata)
description:
Can you get to the end of the old fortress?

The old fortress "Apodaca 1890" is full of challenges and dangers.

Will you be able to fulfill the mission that was assigned to you?

In this fun action-platformer game, you'll have to go through the ancient fortress from start to finish to achieve your goal.

Controls

Move left: A key, Left arrow key.

Move right: D key, Right arrow key.

Jump: W key, Left arrow key

For touch screens, enable the view of on-screen controls.

A game by Amado Mata.

Made with libGDX.
